item.title: 【Helpdesk】[HELP] How to download a file from HotLink
item.description:
Hi, ShareMania users!

I wanna know if any of you would be kind enough to help me download a file from HotLink. Since I'm not a member of this server, I've tried to download the file for free (not premium) but failed to get it because:
  • The link you're given once you press Free Download will break after 12 hours.
  • The speed is restricted to 50 kb/s, which makes the download (5.5 GB) take ages to be fulfilled (around 1day 13 hours 22 min).
  • According to these limitations, I can't seem to download the file because it literally takes more time to be fully downloaded than the given time of the valid link I'm given.
  • I can only try this once every 24 hours because the site has a download limit.
This is the link of the file I'm trying to download:

https://hotlink.cc/ps4chymrbvk0/PIB32.rar

Thank you so much in advance if any of you can let me know a way to download it or find a way themselves to get it for me instead. Have a good day if you're reading this!
item.author: Kelevra1986
